version_description:
MINOR BUGS FIXED - Our team is working permanently to improve your experience.

** If you enjoy playing Mastermind, please rate us! Thank you for your support!**

Minor Bugs Fixed - Enjoy your favorite board game and have lots of fun!

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING MASTERMIND CODE BREAKER!! DON'T FORGET TO RATE IT!

Minor Bugs Fixed - Enjoy your favorite board game and have lots of fun!

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING MASTERMIND CODE BREAKER!! DON'T FORGET TO RATE IT!

- More pegs, more tries to guess them - You can now choose between easy and hard mode of playing - the easy one is with the four pegs and 8 tries to guess them and the hard mode with 5 pegs and 12 tries to find the pegs' places!
- Placing of pegs - place the pegs in whichever slot you want, you don’t have to go from left to right anymore
- See the whole board on game over - now you can see the whole board once you finish the game, so you can study your mistakes in order not to repeat them
- Minor bugs fixed

Thank you for playing Mastermind game! We appreciate your comments and suggestions, so go ahead and rate the game to tell us what you think!

Hey there masterminds!

Here's a better and improved version of our game so that you can enjoy playing it even more!

[+] Minor bugs fixed

We value your feedback, so if you have something to share, then email us at hello@peaksel.com . If you’re enjoying the game, please leave us a rating and a review.

Hey there, brainiacs!

Here's a better and improved version of our game so that you can enjoy playing it even more!

[+] Challenge friends via Facebook bug has been fixed
[+] Pesky little bugs have been fixed

We value your feedback, so if you have something to share, then email us at hello@peaksel.com . If you’re enjoying the game, please leave us a rating and a review.

Hey there, mind games lovers!

[+] Game Center Leaderboard removed
[+] Facebook Friends Leaderboard coming soon

We appreciate your comments and suggestions so if you have something to share, please email us. If you like the game, please, rate it and leave a review.

Hey there, mind games lovers! This update brings you several cool features!

- Endless lives for free!
- Hard mode - 5 pegs can be played for free!
- Friends Leaderboard - See how you rank amongst your Facebook friends

We appreciate your comments and suggestions so if you have something to share, please email us at hello@peaksel.com. If you like the game, please, rate it and leave a review.

Hey there, mind games lovers!

- Less ads to make your play time more enjoyable.

We appreciate your comments and suggestions so if you have something to share, please email us at hello@peaksel.com. If you like the game, please, rate it and leave a review.

PREVIOUS UPDATES:
* Endless lives for free!
* Hard mode - 5 pegs can be played for free!
* Friends Leaderboard - See how you rank amongst your Facebook friends
Hi, there. We appreciate all your comments and suggestions as they help us improve. This time, we've just made minor changes so that you can play the game without any hiccups. Enjoy!
